honors_and_awards.title: ESD Auditor
honors_and_awards.description: Earners of this program explored the role of educational institutions and students' unions in progressing sustainability understanding and were trained to realize the potential for embedding sustainability in learning through Education for Sustainable Development. They used their training to audit their institution and/or students' union on how sustainability is integrated through teaching and learning.

honors_and_awards.title: Course Representative
honors_and_awards.description: Elected as Course Rep to work with the staff and fellow students to improve the learning and teaching experience of the MSc Economics 2021 cohort at the University of Liverpool Management School.
